mapper.select: select g_idx, g_email, g_name, g_photo, g_phone, g_url, g_profile, g_level, g_card, g_date, g_cvc, g_point from guest where g_idx=#{g_idx}

SELECT g_idx, d_img1, o_state, o_orderdate, o_payment, o_ckin, o_ckout, o_finalprice FROM hotel_detail d, orders o, guest g WHERE d.d_idx = o.o_didx AND g.g_idx = o_gidx and g_idx=#{g_idx} order BY o_orderdate
